General.Name: Sino-Argi Leading Biosciences
General.Description: Sino-Agri Leading Biosciences Co.,Ltd researches, develops, produces, and distributes agrochemicals in China and internationally. It offers insecticides, fungicides, and herbicides. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Beijing, China. Sino-Agri Leading Biosciences Co.,Ltd is a subsidiary of China National Agricultural Means of Production Group Corporation.
General.Address: Global Finance & News Center, Beijing, China, 100052
